TopicTitle: [1.12.x] EVA Parachutes & Ejection Seats (with sound & multiple parachutes)

Articles.Content:
Not sure, but you can try setting the value :

minAirPressureToOpen = 10

I don't know if that will work or generate an error, please try this and let me know, it's a reasonable request

Is there a way to make stock parachute open up not the mod's?

Don't get me wrong, I love the mod, but I want to be able to control where I am falling. Your parachute just falls down straight...

I just noticed something about this mod in my install, while testing some behaviour that killed a few Kerbals during a simulated pad abort, and I don't see this mentioned anywhere. It doesn't use the capsule's hatch's angle as you might interpret it, i.e. directly out from the hatch orientation -- it uses the angle between the capsule hatch and the root part. Whether that's intentional or not, it makes for some interesting pad aborts if you have e.g. a stack of two capsules and the top one is the root part: Kerbals get ejected into the ground. The fix is obviously quite easy: Just make the root part the bottom capsule, or even the heatshield underneath it if you want the ejection to lob the Kerbals up a bit.

New release, 0.2.0

  • Updated for KSP 1.8
  • Added InstallChecker
  • Deleted old unused code files

Would be nice though if you just used the stock EVA chutes. Feel like I can manuever better with them, and there's also no reason not to use them. I mean I know that they are fast, but maybe you could choose between your chutes and the stock chutes?

Edited April 15, 2020 by Kev1n8088

42 minutes ago, Kev1n8088 said:

Would be nice though if you just used the stock EVA chutes. Feel like I can manuever better with them, and there's also no reason not to use them. I mean I know that they are fast, but maybe you could choose between your chutes and the stock chutes?

And yes, you can.  But this is intended to be part of an ejection seat, and the main concern is to save the pilot.  Ejection seat parachutes have to be packed extremely tightly into a very small space, no room left over for frivolities
for some reason I get BOTH the stock and this mods chutes in the PAW and with animations, appearance etc....I am running this through RO/RP-1 is there a way to fix that? A patch perhaps?

New release, 0.2.0.3

  • Renamed DLL for CKAN compatibility
  • Added AssemblyFileVersion
  • Updated version file for 1.12

Question/Curiosity:

browsing folders and files in Vanguard Technologies, I found a MM patch that adds "ModuleKrKerbalParachute" to some of the "kerbalEVA" definitions, namely the Default and Vintage ones (both for the male and female versions).......
... should it been update also for the Slim and Future ones???
Is there any way to use this with RP-1? In sandbox mode, or with all nodes unlocked, I am not seeing the ejection parts available anywhere.
